name: maslow-gpt-sdk
description: An npm package for demonstration purposes using TypeScript to build for both the ECMAScript Module format (i.e. ESM or ES Module) and CommonJS Module format. It can be used in Node.js and browser applications.

scripts.reset-main-branch: git checkout --orphan latest_branch && git add -A && git commit -am "First commit ;-)" && git branch -D main && git branch -m main && git push -f --set-upstream origin main
scripts.first-push: npm run git-init && git add . && git commit -m "first commit" && git branch -M main && git remote add origin https://github.com/MaslowCorporation/maslow-gpt-sdk.git && git push -u origin main
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build:esm && npm run build:cjs
scripts.publish:test: npm run build && npm version patch --no-git-tag-version && npm publish --registry http://localhost:4873
scripts.publish:production: npm run build && npm version patch --no-git-tag-version && npm publish
scripts.push: (git add . && git commit -m "I'm a bigger pusher than Ice-T homie !!!" && git push) || exit 0

author: John Doe
